items.content_html: SimpleDBJS is a Node.js library that provides a client interface to communicate with SimpleDB, a lightweight Database Management System (DBMS) written in C++. It allows developers to interact with SimpleDB using WebSocket technology, enabling seamless integration with web applications.
items.title: cameronMcConnell/SimpleDBJS: SimpleDBJS is a Node.js library that provides a client interface to communicate with SimpleDB, a lightweight Database Management System (DBMS) written in C++. It allows developers to interact with SimpleDB using WebSocket technology, enabling seamless integration with web applications.
